snippet: As recent ratings have improved for NBC’s “Today,” Matt Lauer will remain on the morning show for more than two years, according to NBC executives.
abstract: NBC's Today show signs veteran newsman Matt Lauer to a multi-year contract extension; move comes as vote of confidence in Lauer despite period of upheaval for the show.
lead_paragraph: As recent ratings have improved for NBC’s “Today,” Matt Lauer will remain on the morning show for more than two years, according to NBC executives.

headline.main: Despite Upheavals, NBC Extends Lauer’s Contract
headline.print_headline: Despite Upheavals, NBC Extends Lauer’s Contract
